tic tak to

April 13, 2025 Tags: Puzzles
Tic Tac Toe Game - Description &amp; Controls Game Description This Tic Tac Toe game is a modern, interactive version of the classic two-player strategy game. Players take turns marking X or O on a 3&times;3 grid, aiming to get three of their symbols in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally). Game Features: Two-Player Mode (Player X vs. Player O) Score Tracking (Wins are recorded) Winner Announcement (Popup when a player wins or its a draw) Responsive Design (Works on mobile &amp; desktop) Simple &amp; Clean UI (Easy to play)

Tic Tac Toe Game - Description &amp; Controls Game Description This Tic Tac Toe game is a modern, interactive version of the classic two-player strategy game. Players take turns marking X or O on a 3&times;3 grid, aiming to get three of their symbols in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally). Game Features: Two-Player Mode (Player X vs. Player O) Score Tracking (Wins are recorded) Winner Announcement (Popup when a player wins or its a draw) Responsive Design (Works on mobile &amp; desktop) Simple &amp; Clean UI (Easy to play)
